front.title: Ion Cannon
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your Star Destroyer. May target a starship using 1 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny +2 > defense value, all starship weapons deployed on target are lost, armor or maneuver = 0 and hyperspeed = 0.
front.lore: Fires blasts of ionized energy. Causes massive disruptions in weapon, engine and computer systems aboard a target. Disables starship defenses against tractor beams.

combo: Ion Cannon + I Want That Ship
